Articles.Content: I was just wondering if anyone else has bought any of the kerbal merchandise. I just got finished ordering the kerbal flag planting t-shirt
Not yet, however I may do at some point in the future, depending on how much I want it. (The answer is very, more of a case of whether I have enough money.)
The one thing I want is the one thing they don't have. A large print of the old loading screen image. I forget who did it, but I know it's a DA artist. I would love to have that framed over my desk.
I will be soon, i get paid by the month so it's hard managing the budget.

I plan on buying a mousepad, bumper sticker, and T-Shirt

I just need to measure myself for those shirts because their sizes seem way off.
I ordered a mouse pad, T-shirt, and mouse pad. Can't wait

I ordered a mouse pad, T-shirt, and mouse pad. Can't wait

You ordered two mouse mats? Ah no don't worry its so you can have twice the awesome.
You can make some snazzy kerbal tshirt pretty cheap your self

The one thing I want is the one thing they don't have. A large print of the old loading screen image. I forget who did it, but I know it's a DA artist. I would love to have that framed over my desk.

If a load screen T comes out in black I'm getting it.

You ordered two mouse mats? Ah no don't worry its so you can have twice the awesome.

Lol, oops. Meant to say, coffee mug instead of a second mouse pad
Going to buy the mousepad soon, as I don't have one

I'm thinking of getting the three kerbal t-shirt, but waiting for now to see if they're coming out with anything else. I would love to be able to order little models of our rocket designs from the store as well!
Where do I find said merchandise?

Lol, oops. Meant to say, coffee mug instead of a second mouse pad

But I thought you could never have enough mouse pads.

Where do I find said merchandise?

http://www.cafepress.com/kerbalspaceprogram
I'm going to get a bumper sticker...
The loading screen artist is MK01, and you can find that image HERE, including the option to buy it as a print, a mousepad or a magnet.
Must get second job for awesome new KSP bling XD
ooh you guys got cafepress! I have my own store at cafepress too!

It looks like theres two lots of kerbal stuff on there:

http://www.cafepress.com/kerbalspaceprogram from Capt Skunkies announcement,

and http://www.cafepress.com/+kerbal+gifts with some other items.

I wonder if they are all Squad's

I would love to buy from cafepress, but... I'm in Germany, and want to buy though cafepress.de. Sadly, KSP merch isn't available through .de.

Want to say "shut up and take my money" as I buy a t-shirt, mousepad & bumper stickers. Please, squad, let me buy through .de

I would love to buy from cafepress, but... I'm in Germany, and want to buy though cafepress.de. Sadly, KSP merch isn't available through .de.

Want to say "shut up and take my money" as I buy a t-shirt, mousepad & bumper stickers. Please, squad, let me buy through .de

Its not :< ?

I really want that Mug, for the atmosphere when I make another coffee in the middle of the night while playing

Its not :< ?

I couldn't find it. If you do find it, please remember to post the link to the .de shop
PLEASE add children's sizes to the current lineup? My 4yr old boy would LOVE a Kerbal shirt!

It looks like theres two lots of kerbal stuff on there:

http://www.cafepress.com/kerbalspaceprogram from Capt Skunkies announcement,

and http://www.cafepress.com/+kerbal+gifts with some other items.

I wonder if they are all Squad's

The second link is from Kerbal Comics - http://www.kerbalcomics.com/
